pages.text: Applied Energistics 2 (AE2) is a comprehensive storage and automation mod. $(br2)With a focus on digital storage, AE2 lets you organize, search, and manage all your items effortlessly. $(br2)Build intricate networks to process materials, automate crafting, and keep everything neat and accessible.

pages.title: Finding a Meteorite
pages.text: Meteorites are key to starting AE2! Search for these sites to find Skystone and Inscriber Presses.

Inside the meteorite, you'll also find Certus Quartz, a key material for AE2. You cannot move Flawless Certus Quartz blocks with packing tape; you'll need to progress to spatial storage to do so. $(br2)Until then, you can break the other blocks with Silk Touch to move them and repair them as they degrade. Note that Flawless Certus Quartz blocks never get damaged.

pages.title: Crafting a Charger
pages.text: $(br2)Craft a Charger to create Charged Certus Quartz, then combine it with Redstone and Nether Quartz to form Fluix Crystals.

From here, you'll build a game-changing basic ME Storage network. As you expand your AE2 network, build ME Controllers to increase its capacity. $(br2)Automate crafting with Molecular Assemblers and Crafting Co-Processors, and manage your items with ME Storage Cells. $(br2)With P2P tunnels, you can even transfer signals, fluids, and more between distant networks!
For more detailed information, AE2 offers an in-game guide. $(br2)You can hover over AE2 items in JEI and hold the 'G' key for quick access to the guide.
